Web Tools

CutFree

 Design pools of DNA barcodes compatible with restriction enzymes. [website] [code]

 Quickly check alignment of primers and oligonucleotides. [website] [code]

Data & Code

  • gapsplit: Efficient random sampling for COBRA models. (Keaty 2019)
    • Matlab and Python code (GitHub)

  • Cached Flux Coupling and FALCON (Pradhan 2019)
    • R package for cachedFCF, FALCON, and delete-and-couple
    • Python package for cachedFCF
    • R code and data for simulations and figures
